title: Interpretation of seeing dogs running in a dream?

preview.html: Escaping from dogs in a dream: Seeing someone escaping from dogs in a dream has many meanings, ranging from worrying to what indicates an escape from problems and the disappearance of worries, and its meanings vary depending on the details of the dream and the social status of the dreamer. We find that a young man differs from a married man, and a married woman’s visions differ from a single woman, and so on. What is the interpretation of seeing dogs running in a dream? If a dog approaches the dreamer in a dream, this means that there are enemies and haters waiting for him and that they are trying to harm him in various ways. As for the interpretation of a dream about escaping from dogs It means that the dreamer has the ability to overcome difficulties and challenges, no matter how strong they are, and will continue on his path without looking back so as not to lose his goal. Or deviate from it. If the dog was huge and tried to catch up with it but could not, then the fortuneteller had committed a great sin in the past, but he repented of what he had done and tried to obey him so that God would forgive him for what he had lost. But one of the human demons tries to lure him back to the same dark path. It does not give him a chance to attract him and adhere to his principles and morals that he has now become. It is also said that escaping from this means that he is trying to avoid dealing with the powerful who enslaved people and were content with menial jobs, even if they were barely supporting himself and his family. Some interpreters said that this dream means making serious efforts To repent for sins and transgressions, but there are still some temptations that the dreamer may fall prey to again if he does not adhere to his religion. If he had already left and the dogs had not chased him, he would have been saved from a great deal of trouble that he almost fell into as a result of his poor choice. To his friends and acquaintances, but later regrets it because he received a lot of advice in this. He respected them and did not answer them. It could be an expression of the conflict of ideas and questions in the mind of the viewer, especially if there is a reason for that, and he must seek help from those with experience in the issues he is thinking about and not be stubborn. Or he is arrogant with his intelligence, because intelligence is sometimes not possible without life experiences. As for the sound of the dog that scares him, and makes him stumble and run, it is a sign that the stage of calm and stability has ended, and that he has entered another stage of tension, whether at work or at home. If the fortuneteller is young and his feet slip On the path of sins and disobedience, he tries to escape from those friends who follow him everywhere, and want to return him to his bad habits. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Escape Of dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that despite what is known about a dog’s loyalty to its owner, its presence in dreams is evidence of treachery and treachery, as the fortuneteller is deceived by someone close to his heart, and there are many other interpretations that we learn about as follows: If a person is able to escape unscathed He is already suffering from a financial crisis, so he can overcome it alone and without anyone’s help while he struggles and struggles in his work until he secures the money necessary to pay off his debts.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eggplant according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream: Seeing vegetables and fruits in general is a desirable vision of goodness and food, but what is the significance of seeing eggplant? What is the meaning behind that? This vision has different meanings, and is due to the variation based on different considerations, including the color of the eggplant, it can be black or white, and it can be fried, baked, stuffed or baked. What concerns us in this article is to review all the indications and special cases In a dream about eggplant. What is the interpretation of a dream about eggplant according to Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about eggplant. Seeing eggplant in a dream represents goodness, grace, growth, food, simplicity of life, discrimination, learning responsibilities, and performing tasks without delay or neglect. This vision also suggests effort, sincerity, hard work, tireless pursuit, and the desire to achieve what you want in the shortest way. Possible no matter how heavy the burdens and difficulties are. If eggplant is seen in its season, this is good and abundant nutrition, but if it is out of season, this is not good and may indicate unhappiness, great patience, and instability of the situation. Seeing eggplant also indicates deep thinking and far-sightedness, and thinking about worldly matters. And the ambition to know how best to manage resources and meet requirements that increase day by day. Eggplant can indicate the kind words, compliments, and advice you get from adults and the knowledge you gain after long journeys and efforts. If the viewer is a fan of science and approaches it, then this vision indicates Gaining experiences and gaining knowledge and knowledge of other cultures and sciences. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing eggplant means sustenance and blessing, expanding the circle of profits, achieving goals gradually and with good integrity. If the eggplant is on time, it means collecting money and reaping fruits without fatigue or hardship. But if It was not on time, as this symbolizes the livelihood that a person earns after long toil and hardship. This vision also indicates continuous thinking about how to deal with future events and ambiguous circumstances and save money for tomorrow and its difficult days. If a person sees that he is eating eggplant, this indicates popular trade. And large profits and low commodity prices. The same previous vision also expresses engagement and flattery to achieve the desired goal and the adoption of methods that may be unacceptable to achieve the desired goal. But if a person sees eggplant in his home, this indicates a living income, knowledge of the home’s requirements, and work to provide them. Interpretation of a dream Eggplant for a single woman: Seeing eggplant in a dream symbolizes calm, contemplation, opening the heart, reaping fruits, passing trials, and benefiting from experiences. This vision also expresses patience, gaining knowledge and knowledge, and the desire to see the things it hides. This vision is an indication of the arrival of a period full of occasions and joys and the arrival of some news. Which makes her happy and makes her heart happy as compensation for the difficulties she has recently gone through. And if she sees someone cooking eggplant, this

title: Interpretation of beating one’s wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of hitting a woman in a dream: Marriage is one of the most important human relationships. Islamic law regulates the marital relationship between a man and a woman. Islamic law commands a woman to obey her husband and protect him with his money, family, and children. Even the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - said: If I ordered someone to prostrate to someone other than me, I would be met with that, and I was commanded. The wife prostrates to her husband, and this is evidence of a close bond. Between husband and wife, Islamic law also commands the husband to have the right to submit to his wife. Such as her commitment to alimony and providing all the moral and material rights that make the family stable... As for the husband who beats his wife. This is evidence of violating what Islamic law commands, and seeing that there are interpretations in a dream that differ according to the method of beating. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin being beaten in a dream: If a man sees in a dream that he is beating his wife. This is evidence that this man’s wife advises him and directs him to what is best for him, and he must listen to her words and put them into practice. Until this good is achieved, but if a woman sees in her dream that her husband is beating her, then she will be beaten. This is evidence that this woman’s husband loves her very much and is jealous of her, and indicates that the husband is warning his wife about a certain matter, and she must listen to his words and implement them. To achieve stability in marital life. If the wife sees in her dream that her husband is beating her severely, this is evidence that the husband loves her, and it also indicates that pregnancy is coming soon. However, if the wife sees that her husband is beating her without violence, then she is not violent. This is evidence that the husband and wife will have a great benefit in the future, which may be traveling abroad, or earning a lot of money, or a stable marital life, or a bright future for their children. Interpretation of seeing a woman being beaten in a dream If the wife sees in her dream that her husband is hitting her with his hand, this is evidence However, her husband will give her a gift that will make her happy, and this is evidence of the husband’s desire to get closer to his wife, and he must respond to him with the same feelings. To enjoy a life full of happiness and peace of mind, but if the husband sees that he is beating his wife at home, and there are people in the house who are strangers to them, they will be satisfied. This is evidence that this wife is doing something that angers God Almighty, and she must repent for these actions, otherwise she will be exposed. Why see strangers in a dream. Evidence of disclosure. But if he sees in a dream that he is beating his wife violently, and this beating is accompanied by insults, humiliation, and humiliation; This is evidence that this woman has been cheating on this man for a long time and that the husband knew about it, but did not want to tell her. For the stability of marital life. When the man got tired of this woman's plot, he revealed to her the truth about what she was doing, as well as indications that marital life between them had become almost impossible, due to the lack of understanding between them and the many problems. this happens. Because of a misunderstanding. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant wife being beaten in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees her husband beating her in a dream. This is evidence that the child this woman is carrying will have a relationship in the future and that God Almighty will bless her in this situation

title: What is the interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a gold ring in a dream and interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin? What is the interpretation of gold in a dream? Many dreamers want clear and accurate meanings about the symbol of gold in a dream. Through the following lines, we will reveal to them the most accurate meanings of this symbol and learn about the interpretation of gold jewelry, gold coins, gold mines, and other important symbols. , read it below. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of gold in a dream? What is the interpretation of a dream about gold? Does it convey good news or is it interpreted as warning signs? Follow the sections below to learn the exact interpretations: Interpretation of gold according to its color: White gold: It indicates luxury, stability, and a lot of money, even if the gold seen in the dream is white in color and has diamonds, then the dream is interpreted as victory in this world, glory, and a high status. Gold Yellow: This symbol is sometimes interpreted well if the color of gold is bright yellow, and here the scene indicates success, fame, and higher professional ranks, but if pale yellow gold is seen in the dream, then the vision here indicates illness and practical and material failure. Black gold: indicates poverty and distress. If the visionary feels fear and anxiety in the vision when he sees black gold, but if the gold piece is shiny black and studded with turquoise, emeralds, or any other type of precious stones, this indicates a high value. And influence and power. Interpretation of gold according to its shape: See gold bullion: It indicates drought, distress, and major failure in the dreamer’s career. Check a golden pen: It indicates the dreamer’s knowledge and high level of culture, and the dream can confirm that the dreamer is talented in the fields of creative writing. See house Of gold: It is interpreted by the burning fire that spreads in the dreamer’s house and burns most of his family members, and this dream is one of the worst dreams seen in a dream. What is the interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin placed the symbol of gold in the list of bad symbols that he sees The dreamer in a dream, as it indicates adversity, poverty, and loss of good things and money. These are some important signs of seeing gold by Ibn Sirin and some jurists: Interpretation of a dream about gold according to the gender of the dreamer: Man: Ibn Sirin strongly dislikes the appearance of gold in a man’s dream, and interprets it as the death of blessings, and perhaps it indicates the many sins and transgressions that the dreamer commits in his life. Women. Ibn Sirin said that gold in a woman’s dream looks good in many cases and is interpreted as marriage, offspring, or successful projects. Seeing gold in the form of jewelry: a golden necklace: It indicates the pregnancy of a married woman or indicates many life responsibilities and duties that The dreamer will bear it in the near future, and the heavy necklace means many painful burdens that the dreamer suffers from, while the light necklace indicates livelihood and money. The golden neck: showing religion, interest in the Holy Qur’an, and the desire to memorize it. The golden ring: symbolizes engagement and marriage, or occupying a position of power and prestige. In society in general and in the

title: What is the interpretation of rising above the ground in a dream?

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you in detail the interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream. Many of those who see in their dreams that they are rising from the level of the ground are afraid of this vision, and when they wake up from sleep, they are confused by the dream that they saw, and they want to know whether this dream is a signal or just a dream coming from the subconscious. It has no reference to the dreamer, and interpretation scholars say that this dream has many connotations, but it differs according to the marital status of the person who saw it, and that is why we explain to you in the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia of interpretation of this dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of climbing to the sky for single people. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is higher than the ground, far from it and close to the sky, then this is a praiseworthy vision that shows that she is a girl who wants to get close to it. May God Almighty preserve her religion. If an unmarried girl dreams in her dream that she is gradually rising from the level of the ground, then this is good news that she is approaching the date of her marriage to a righteous and strengthened man whose financial condition is stable and she will be happy. With him in her married life. Interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream for a married woman: Scientists say that seeing a married woman in her dream gradually rising from the ground and moving away from it. This is a good vision that indicates the stability of the life she lives with her husband and family. This vision also shows that her husband carries great love for her in his heart, and seeks to please and make her happy. Seeing rising above ground level in a married woman’s dream indicates that this woman is working hard to get closer to Almighty God and is also seeking to guide the people around her and invite them to worship God and delve deeper into matters. Religious. Interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is rising from the ground, this is a vision that tells her that God Almighty will give birth to a male for her. This vision also shows righteous offspring and that the children of this woman will have a great position in society and a high position among People in the future. Interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream for a man: If a man sees in his dream that he is sitting on a chair that resembles a throne, and then this chair rises with him from the ground and ascends to the sky, then this is a good vision that indicates success in work and may indicate that. That the dreamer will obtain great positions and important positions in the job he occupies. And if the dreamer is suffering from the accumulation of debts, and he sees in his dream that he is rising from the ground, then this is a vision that promises him vast abundance, great wealth, and a lot of money, and God will help him. He must pay all his debts. Interpretation of rising from the ground in a dream for a young man: If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is gradually rising from the ground, then this is good news for the date of his engagement to a good and pious girl, and he will marry her and live a stable, trouble-free life. With her. Seeing her rising from the earth and reaching the sky in a young man’s dream indicates the dreamer’s effort to get closer to God Almighty through good deeds. If the dreamer is looking for a job

title: Interpretation of a dream about a preacher hitting his fiancée in a dream according to the most famous interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of a preacher beating his fiancée in a dream by the most famous interpretive scholars. The dream of being beaten is one of the dreams that many people dream about in their dreams, and this disturbing vision carries many connotations, which vary according to the condition of the dreamer, as some of them indicate the food and righteousness of the fortuneteller. Which he may have in the coming period, or indicates exposure to problems and crises with others, and of course many interpretation scholars have explained the clues contained in these dreams. Interpretation of dreams of the fiancé hitting his fiancée in a dream. Seeing the fiancé being beaten is considered a strange vision, especially since The fiancé is the one who loves and respects his fiancée, and being beaten in a dream may be a sign of the livelihood and money that he will gain. title: Interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the birth of a girlInterpretation of seeing the birth of a girlIt carries goodness for whoever sees this vision, no matter how different the social status of the dreamer is. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a girl in a single dreamIf an unmarried girl sees that she gave birth to a girl in her dream, the interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a girl in a dream indicates that she will improve and change her life from bad to better.The symbol of giving birth to a girl in an unmarried girl's dream indicates that this girl does good deeds and is close to her Almighty Lord and is distinguished by good qualities and morals that make her reputation among people pulsate with goodness.If the unmarried girl is still studying and sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a child, this dream promises her that she will get high grades that will make her excel academically.If the dreaming girl is unmarried and has some financial difficulties that force her to pay off her debts, this dream indicates that she will get enough sustenance that will make her pay off all her debts.If an unmarried girl is engaged and dreams that she gave birth to a child from that person in a dream, this dream foretells her that God will bless them with marriage.In the case of an unmarried girl who was not Engaged and dreaming that she is giving birth to a child in a dream, this dream indicates that a righteous man who fears God will propose to her. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl in a married woman's dream Interpretation of seeing the birth of a girl in a married woman's dream indicates that she lives a stable and peaceful family life with a righteous husband and righteous children. If a married woman is suffering from family crises and troubles and sees that she has given birth to a girl, this dream is considered good news for her that she will get rid of all crises in a way that makes her live a stable life. The symbol of a woman giving birth in a married woman's dream indicates that she will gain unlimited wealth and riches enjoyed by the dreamer, her husband and her family. If a married woman has not had children before, and she dreams that she has given birth to a girl in her dream, this dream is interpreted that God will grant her righteous offspring. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a beautiful girl in her dream, and this lady did not pray and moved away from worship. This vision is interpreted as a warning to her of the need to get closer to God and follow the path of truth. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl in a pregnant woman's dream Interpretation of seeing the birth of a girl A pregnant woman's dream portends a birth that does not entail any stress or cause complications during childbirth. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a pregnant woman sees herself giving birth to a child, this dream indicates that she will give birth to a male child. However, if this dream is about giving birth to a girl at the end of pregnancy, this dream is an interpretation of the type of fetus in her womb, which is female. The birth of a beautiful girl in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence that she will enjoy good health after giving birth and that her child will be healthy and in good health. However, if the pregnant woman sees that she has given birth to a child with bad qualities, this dream is a warning to take care of her health, because this neglect causes her health problems that may expose her to the loss of the fetus. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a green leaf for single women and married women

The symbol of the birth of a girl in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that this girl does good deeds, is close to her Almighty Lord, and is distinguished by good qualities and morals that make her reputation among people shine with goodness. Interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is living a stable and peaceful family life with a good husband and good children. If a married woman is suffering from crises and family troubles and sees that she has given birth to a girl, then this dream is considered good news. She told her that she would get rid of all crises in a way that would make her live a stable life. The symbol of a woman’s birth in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will acquire unlimited riches and riches that the dreamer, her husband, and her family will enjoy. In the event that a married woman did not have children before, and she dreamed that she gave birth to a girl in her dream, this dream interprets that God will grant her good offspring. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a beautiful girl in her dream, and this lady did not pray for her and turned away from worship. This vision is interpreted as a warning to her of the necessity of getting closer to God and following the path of truth. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl in a pregnant woman’s dreamInterpretation of a vision of giving birth to a girl: A pregnant woman’s dream portends a birth that does not entail any stress and does not cause complications during childbirth. Dream interpretation scholars say that if she sees The pregnant woman herself gives birth to a child, then this dream indicates that she will give birth to a male child. But if this dream is the birth of a girl at the end of pregnancy, then this dream serves as an interpretation of the gender of the fetus in her womb, which is female. The birth of a beautiful girl in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence However, if the pregnant woman sees that she has given birth to a child with unpleasant characteristics, then this dream is a warning to pay attention to her health, because this negligence causes her health problems that may expose her to loss. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman?  Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and fear for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman

preview.html: The dream of judgment for a married woman is one of those strange dreams that she rarely dreams of, but in any case it carries many meanings that differ according to the feeling of the woman who dreams, and whether she was afraid or not, and there are many words of translators on this subject. Which we learn about through today’s topic. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman? Many scholars have said that a woman’s lack of fear when seeing meat on the Day of Resurrection is a good sign of her righteousness and piety and the abundance of good deeds that she performs. The dreamer’s morals are impeccable. She enjoys the love of people and enjoys their protection and care within the context of her family. But if she is dissatisfied with her husband and sees this dream and is thinking about divorcing him for one reason or another, then she must think calmly again and put her children first and try to get closer to her husband. And consult with him. If she is seen standing in the middle of people on the Day of Resurrection, this is a sign that she was wronged a lot in her life, whether that was injustice done to her by her family, her husband, or her manager at work. . If he was an employee, she would not have passed by him. And if she sees the graves scattered and what is in them comes out, then she is on good terms with all of the husband’s family and lives under the care of her husband in peace and stability. What is the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin? The imam said that a woman who does not fear a dream about seeing atrocities Today, she actually lives in a state of calm and psychological stability due to her good relationship with the Creator, Glory be to Him, as she performs the obligatory prayer. The supplication of supplication does not leave an opportunity to do good unless he hastens to do it and does it out of a desire to increase his closeness to God Almighty. But if she feels terrified and terrified by the horror of the scene in the dream, then there are sins that she commits and turns away from the path of guidance, but she recently learned that her life is not immortal and that death It definitely comes. So he hastens to repent and seek forgiveness from God Almighty, so let him accept it and be satisfied with it. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the fear of a married woman. It is natural for fear and terror to fill hearts at that time, but the fact that this happens in... The dream is a warning and an important sign that we will learn about below: A woman’s fear of the horror of the resurrection may be a sign of the wrong she committed towards her husband by trusting her and the security he gave her, but unfortunately she did not deserve that trust and from here she must work to improve. Her behavior and she protects her husband, especially in her absence, so that God’s wrath is not revealed to her. The Resurrection is the end of the world and the entrance to a new beginning, so some scholars said that seeing it is a sign of improving the family’s vision and stability after a long period of problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection for a married woman’s feeling A woman’s approaching Day of Resurrection in her dream is evidence that she has the same curse that accuses her of it every time she commits a mistake or sin, and that her conscience no longer allows her to repeat those irresponsible actions that she did before. Another opinion held that insight suffers from a bad psychological state that is controlling it these days and is nothing more than a universe

title: Interpretation of locusts in a dream

preview.html: But when we see it in a dream, it carries different connotations and meanings according to each person's condition, and in the following lines we present to you the most important interpretations of this vision and its meaning from the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees flying locusts in a dream, this is a sign of distress and anxiety in life. If an unmarried girl sees locusts in a dream, this means sadness and lack of livelihood, and that God will look at her with a solution soon, God willing. Also, if an unmarried girl sees a group of locusts in a dream. This indicates the emergence of some difficulties in this girl's life and will end in a short time. If an unmarried girl sees locusts as if they are crossing water such as a river or sea. This indicates a close journey in the life of the dreamer. This dream also shows support in the life of a single woman, and locusts in the sea often portend a lot of good. When an unmarried girl sees a group of locusts on her bed. This is evidence that she will soon have a life partner who will be a soldier or an officer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for a woman Married If a married woman dreams that she is getting rid of locusts from her house. This is a sign of the end of difficulties and judgments related to her in reality. If a married woman dreams that she is hitting locusts and ending her life, this indicates the end of sadness and distress. Seeing locusts in a dream for a married woman is a sign of many crises in this woman's reality. But he will overcome these crises and soon pass. When a married woman sees locusts in a dream, this indicates the presence of an enemy of a woman or an old lady who means to her. This vision indicates another indication of the presence of a woman in the married woman's life who steals or changes her. Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream about a man and its meaning Seeing locusts in a dream for a man indicates that he is facing many problems on the practical level and they will end, God willing. If a man sees in a dream a group of locusts in his house. This is an indication of the emergence of many problems and crises that worry a person in reality, but he will overcome them. A dream for a man who kills locusts in his house, this means eliminating sadness and distress. The matter that angers him in reality and the beginning of a new, beautiful and stable life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin Meaning Seeing locusts in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation When you see a row of locusts in a pregnant woman's dream. This indicates the crises and harmful things that will occur in this woman's life, but she will overcome them. If a pregnant woman dreams that she has actually killed locusts. This is an indication of his victory over many of the crises and competitions that he is already facing. Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream for young people and its meaning When a young man sees locusts in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of some problems in his material and academic life. Something that will represent a big problem for him in his future life, but thanks to God and his efforts, he will overcome it. Seeing a young man in a dream being attacked by locusts

title: Interpretation of a dream about money and gold by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money and gold: It is one of the dreams that many desire because it is a symbol of wealth and living in luxury and abundance. This dream is often seen as a result of a reflection of what is happening in the subconscious mind and its desire to obtain a lot of money, but if the dreamer does not think about it, the dream carries In the eyes of its owner, there are many signs and indicators that differ depending on his social position in reality, and the events that we see in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about money and gold: Seeing silver turning into gold in a dream is a sign that things will improve for the better, but if we see the opposite, this is a sign of deteriorating conditions. Seeing yourself wearing a lot of gold jewelry and keeping a lot Of money leads to entering into kinship with unsuitable people. Dreaming of many coins and gold bullion is a sign of evil and sadness for the dreamer as a result of his actions. Interpretation of a dream of money and gold by Ibn Sirin. Seeing gold and money in a woman’s dream indicates the livelihood of male children, unlike silver. Which leads to livelihood for females. A woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing a lot of gold, this is a sign of her husband’s high position in society and his high position among people. Whoever sees himself receiving a gold necklace from someone he knows, this is evidence that the dreamer is carrying many burdens. And responsibilities and that he is an honest person in his dealings with others. Dreaming of living in a house made of gold symbolizes that the dreamer and his family will be exposed to harm and damage, and the dreamer who sees himself in a dream melting gold and collecting money from the dream indicates exposure to some problems and quarrels with them. . About it. Seeing a lot of money and gold in a dream leads to the acquisition of an inheritance in the near future, and seeing a gold bullion in a dream indicates exposure to harm or harm, because bullion is a symbol of adversity and severe hardships. Interpretation of a dream about money and gold for single people. A virgin girl’s vision of gold and money in her dream indicates The many blessings that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming period. The viewer who sees the loss of a lot of money and gold from this is an indication that he does not seize opportunities and exploit them. Dreaming about money and gold in a girl’s dream is a sign that a virtuous person with a prominent position will propose for his engagement in the coming period, and many Money and gold in her dream lead to achieving goals and objectives and are a sign of happiness and optimism in various aspects of life. The girl saw money in her dream and this is a sign that many praiseworthy things will happen in her life in the coming period. The dreamer who sees white gold in his dream is a sign of ease in life. Her affairs, good circumstances, and good morals. Interpretation of a dream about money and gold for a married woman. A wife who sees money and gold in her dream indicates that she will be exposed to shocks and disappointments.
